name: Switcheroo (itch) (Utkrisht)
description:
Move Right  :   Right Arrow / D

Move Left    :   Left Arrow / A

Jump            :   Up Arrow / W

You are the big purple square and you have your little AI companion which is green square.

You can only control yourself, your AI can not move but can switch places with you when you want by pressing SHIFT key. Pretty usefull for pressing buttons if you ask me .

Press Shift to see the AI do the magic 

Your goal is  to reach the target with your AI in each level

Press Escape key anytime to go back to menu and R to restart current level
